anya-e0101n0:5_0: Sīlepatiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṁ paññañca bhāvayaṁ;
anya-e0101n0:6_0: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṁ vijaṭaye jaṭanti. ;
anya-e0101n0:7_2: bhagavantaṁ kira sāvatthiyaṁ viharantaṁ rattibhāge aññataro devaputto upasaṅkamitvā attano saṁsayasamugghāṭatthaṁ –
anya-e0101n0:9_0: Taṁ taṁ gotama pucchāmi, ko imaṁ vijaṭaye jaṭanti. –
anya-e0101n0:10_3: Sā hi rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu heṭṭhupariyavasena punappunaṁ uppajjanato saṁsibbanaṭṭhena veḷugumbādīnaṁ sākhājālasaṅkhātā jaṭā viyāti jaṭā,
anya-e0101n0:10_4: sā panesā sakaparikkhāraparaparikkhāresu sakaattabhāvaparaattabhāvesu ajjhattikāyatanabāhirāyatanesu ca uppajjanato antojaṭā bahijaṭāti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:10_5: Tāya evaṁ uppajjamānāya jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā.
anya-e0101n0:10_7: evaṁ tāya taṇhājaṭāya sabbāpi ayaṁ sattanikāyasaṅkhātā pajā jaṭitā vinaddhā,
anya-e0101n0:10_10: Taṁ taṁ gotama pucchāmīti tasmā taṁ pucchāmi.
anya-e0101n0:10_12: Ko imaṁ vijaṭaye jaṭanti imaṁ evaṁ tedhātukaṁ jaṭetvā ṭhitaṁ jaṭaṁ ko vijaṭeyya,
anya-e0101n0:11_0: Evaṁ puṭṭho panassa sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacāro devadevo sakkānaṁ atisakko brahmānaṁ atibrahmā catuvesārajjavisārado
anya-e0101n0:11_1: dasabaladharo anāvaraṇañāṇo samantacakkhu bhagavā tamatthaṁ vissajjento –
anya-e0101n0:12_0: Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṁ paññañca bhāvayaṁ;
anya-e0101n0:13_0: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṁ vijaṭaye jaṭanti. –
anya-e0101n0:24_0: Visuddhimaggaṁ bhāsissaṁ, taṁ me sakkacca bhāsato;
anya-e0101n0:26_1: Tattha visuddhīti sabbamalavirahitaṁ accantaparisuddhaṁ nibbānaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n0:27_0: So panāyaṁ visuddhimaggo katthaci vipassanāmattavaseneva desito. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n0:29_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. ;
anya-e0101n0:31_0: “Yamhi jhānañca paññā ca, sa ve nibbānasantike”ti. ;
anya-e0101n0:33_0: “Kammaṁ vijjā ca dhammo ca, sīlaṁ jīvitamuttamaṁ;
anya-e0101n0:34_0: Etena maccā sujjhanti, na gottena dhanena vā”ti. ;
anya-e0101n0:40_0: Sammappadhānādīsupi eseva nayo. Imasmiṁ pana pañhābyākaraṇe sīlādivasena desito.
anya-e0101n0:41_3: sīlaṁ paripūrayamānoyeva cettha sīle ṭhitoti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:41_4: Tasmā sīlaparipūraṇena sīle patiṭṭhahitvāti ayamettha attho.
anya-e0101n0:41_7: Cittaṁ paññañca bhāvayanti samādhiñceva vipassanañca bhāvayamāno,
anya-e0101n0:41_21: So imaṁ vijaṭaye jaṭanti so iminā ca sīlena iminā ca cittasīsena niddiṭṭhasamādhinā imāya ca tividhāya
anya-e0101n0:41_22: paññāya iminā ca ātāpenāti chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu.
anya-e0101n0:41_23: Seyyathāpi nāma puriso pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhāya sunisitaṁ satthaṁ ukkhipitvā mahantaṁ veḷugumbaṁ vijaṭeyya,
anya-e0101n0:41_24: evameva sīlapathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhāya samādhisilāyaṁ sunisitaṁ vipassanāpaññāsatthaṁ vīriyabalapaggahitena
anya-e0101n0:41_25: pārihārikapaññāhatthena ukkhipitvā sabbampi taṁ attano santāne patitaṁ taṇhājaṭaṁ vijaṭeyya sañchindeyya
anya-e0101n0:41_27: Maggakkhaṇe panesa taṁ jaṭaṁ vijaṭeti nāma.
anya-e0101n0:41_28: Phalakkhaṇe vijaṭitajaṭo sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:42_0: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṁ paññañca bhāvayaṁ;
anya-e0101n0:43_0: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṁ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti. ;
anya-e0101n0:44_4: Ātāpī nipakoti ettha vuttavīriyavasena pana tena sātaccakārinā paññāvasena ca sampajānakārinā hutvā sīle
anya-e0101n0:44_5: patiṭṭhāya cittapaññāvasena vuttā samathavipassanā bhāvetabbāti imamatra bhagavā sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena
anya-e0101n0:46_1: Ettha hi sīlena adhisīlasikkhā pakāsitā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:47_0: Sīlena ca sāsanassa ādikalyāṇatā pakāsitā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:47_3: “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”nti ādivacanato ca sīlaṁ sāsanassa ādi,
anya-e0101n0:47_7: “Kusalassa upasampadā”ti ādivacanato hi samādhi sāsanassa majjhe,
anya-e0101n0:51_0: Tathā sīlena tevijjatāya upanissayo pakāsito hoti.
anya-e0101n0:52_0: Sīlena ca kāmasukhallikānuyogasaṅkhātassa antassa vajjanaṁ pakāsitaṁ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:52_2: Paññāya majjhimāya paṭipattiyā sevanaṁ pakāsitaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:54_0: Sīlena ca tadaṅgappahānavasena kilesappahānaṁ pakāsitaṁ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:55_0: Tathā sīlena kilesānaṁ vītikkamapaṭipakkho pakāsito hoti,
anya-e0101n0:57_0: Tathā sīlena sotāpannasakadāgāmibhāvassa kāraṇaṁ pakāsitaṁ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:58_9: aññe ca evarūpā guṇattikā pakāsitā hontīti.
